'''''Vinyar Tengwar 35''''' is the thirty-fifth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|34|36}}

==Contents==
* Cover: Title page of the ''[[Atanatarion]]'' — Carl F. Hostetter
* E.L.F. News

* "ELFcon IV Report" — Patrick H. Wynne
* "''[[Morgoth's Ring]]'': A Linguistic Review, Part II" — Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
* "Transitions in Translations: German Translations vs. Tolkien's 'Guide to Names', Part I - Names of Persons and Peoples" (column) — Arden R. Smith
